Title: Relates to assault on certain employees assigned to an airport, while in performance of their assigned duties, or in direct relation thereto
Summary: Deems assault on certain employees assigned to an airport, while in performance of their assigned duties, or in direct relation thereto, to be assault in the second degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to deeming assault on certain employees assigned to an airport, while in performance of their assigned duties, or in direct relation thereto, to be assault in the second degree
